transcript.text: oh um guys it's the end of the Sabbath
day getting close to the end anyway
beautiful sunset over the mountains hmm
so beautiful
so I normally only do the evening
Sabbath teaching the air of Shabbat
teaching and then I do the Sabbath hike
but I been asked by two different
subscribers to do a teaching on the head
coverings and so I felt like that was
confirmation to do one so we can get big
mountains so I'm gonna do a brief
teaching on head coverings as the
Shabbat is closing out tonight
essentially a head cover this is people
have asked me about this out this is
100% linen a men's head covering men's
head coverings are different from
women's women's are usually long and
flowing and the man's head covering it's
more like this if you go to the Torah
the priest Levitical priests always wore
head coverings when they did temple
service and in Revelation 1 it says
we're all priests and kings now some
people will bring up 1st Corinthians 11
and say wait a minute Daniel Paul says
clearly do not men should not wear head
coverings when they're praying
prophesying so that's actually not what
Paul's saying remember Paul was a master
master Torah scholar he was trained by
Camellia himself so he certainly knew
Torah backwards and forwards both before
he was converted and after and he never
taught against Torah after he was
converted and followed Yahshua the
Jewish Messiah he continued to teach
Torah and they were they falsely accused
him of opposing Torah but in acts he
makes it very clear in the book of Acts
that he's never taught against Torah in
fact he always encourages people to
follow Torah because that brings us
closer to Messiah in 1st Corinthians
chapter 11 he's dealing with a messianic
congregation in the city of Corinth
there's a lot of strange fire in Corinth
they had to get a lot of Corrections but
in that specific chapter if you actually
go to the the Greek manuscript of what
Paul saying there and of course I think
it might have even been the original
written in Hebrew but just going to the
Greek behind the English there you can
see that what Paul's saying is that
women are to wear long flowing head
coverings when they're praying or
prophesying and men are not to wear
these long flowing veils
because what was happening Corinth is
there was cross-dressing going on a lot
of cross-dressing and so Paul was trying
to clear that up within the Corinth
assembly itself cross-dressing of course
is a violation of Torah it says that a
woman shall not wear what pertains to a
man and vice versa so a man's to wear a
man's head covering and a woman a long
flowing whenever we prayer prophesied
this is further confirmed when Paul says
that if we overcome if we continue to
love yah with everything in us and we
overcome then when we enter eternity we
will inherit a crown of salvation that
means we're gonna have a head covering
on our resurrected body for eternity and
it's further commercial confirmed when
you go to Revelation chapter 19 when
Yahshua the Messiah of Israel returns
and power and glory from the sky what
does it say it says that the Messiah of
Israel will have many crowns upon his
head of course
rabbi greg has a really good teaching
about that - he's talks about how every
crown that you get it shows that the
kingdom that he's conquered and of
course when Yahshua returns he has
conquered all the kingdoms of the world
so that's why he's wearing all these
different crowns but he has a head
covering those a crown is a head
covering every king and priest has a
head covering all through scripture so
even Yahshua in his resurrected body as
a returns from power and glory from the
sky no longer a carpenter but now a king
he will have a head covering so since
our resurrected bodies will have head
coverings and since Yahshua himself will
have head covering why not us why not us
having a head covering it's a powerful
thing when you do it especially for
women there's a scripture in 1st
Corinthians 11 that says when a woman
covers her head with that long feminine
veil when she prays or prophesies she
has power over the Angels women can be
easily deceived by fallen angels that's
what happened in Adam and Eve Adam
wasn't deceived he willfully disobeyed
but he was deceived but when a woman
wears a head covering when she prays or
prophesying it's a act of obedience that
causes these fallen angels to stand back
so head coverings can be very very
powerful I prefer the hundred percent
linen because that's what the priests
actually wore linen is a very healing
fabric if you know anything about how
fabrics heal and the energy levels exude
linen is probably one of the most
healing fabrics for your body okay so at
and to first Corinthians 11 or toward
the end Paul says look if anyone's going
to be contentious over this issue drop
it there's more important things so I'm
not gonna raise a contention over this
issue but I would encourage you to study
this issue out more thoroughly yourself
because ever since I chose to wear a
head covering and I learned about it my
mind is much more clarified I can think
much more clearly I don't nearly have as
much problems with Devils messing with
my mind and look I know not everyone
agrees with this even the pastor I
recommend doesn't wear a head covering
but I do think I do think it's a
commandment I think it's in Scripture I
think it's a principle from Genesis all
the way through revelation and I believe
the Bible never contradicts itself so I
hope this helped okay shabbat shalom
from alaska here everyone i'll leave
everyone with just the last little look
of this beautiful sunset that we're
having probably hear the ocean
[Applause]
shabbat shalom' from general ask guys
